summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Beach Drive, from the south line of Seashore Park 2nd Addition to 63rd Avenue Southwest; 63rd Avenue Southwest, from Beach Drive to Alki Avenue; north side of West Alaska Street, from Beach Drive to vacated 57th Avenue Southwest; and south side of West Alaska Street and Jacobson Road, from Beach Drive to the easterly line of Block 3, Rockaway Beach Addition; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6279, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
